Welcome, Adventurer!

You are about to embark on an infinite quest filled with mysterious situations and tough choices.

Choose wisely: Right choices earn you magical items, wrong choices end your journey, and neutral choices... well, they keep you alive.

Collect items along the way and use them strategically to pass difficult situations!
